ValidationRule.description: these fields are required if business = verticals or marketing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Setup.byPass__c.byPass_WFRule__c = FALSE, RecordType.Name = 'CSI Requests',
OR( ISPICKVAL(Business__c, 'Verticals'), ISPICKVAL(Business__c, 'Marketing') ),
OR( ISBLANK( Products_clients_are_currently_using__c ), ISBLANK( Products_we_are_pitching__c )
))
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
If Business is Verticals or Marketing, fill out required fields below:
Products clients are currently using, Products we are pitching
